column1: By The Numbers Report Builder - Generated Report
Data Source: WSIB Enterprise Information Warehouse.
Data Maturity: As at March 31st of the following year for each injury/illness year.
Data Notation: Includes data for Allowed Lost Time claims only.
Data Notation: Includes data for Schedule 1 and 2 combined.
